name: Ptolemy's Map of Britannia (c.150 AD / 1477 print)
description: Claudius Ptolemy's map of the British Isles from his Geographia (c.150 AD). First printed 1477 in Bologna. Shows Roman Britain including approximate location of Mancunium.
notes:
Ptolemy's Geographia written c.150 AD in Alexandria.
First printed edition: Bologna 1477.
Shows 'Mancunium' (Manchester's Roman fort) roughly positioned.
Multiple Renaissance printed editions: 1477, 1482, 1507, 1513, etc.
NLS may have later printed editions.
Fundamental source for Roman geography of Britain.
